actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to reauthorize the Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Act to promote the protection of the resources of the Northwest Straits, and for other purposes.
short_title: Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2022

summary.text:
Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2022

This bill revises and reauthorizes the Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative and its Northwest Straits Advisory Commission. The initiative and the commission work to protect and restore marine waters, habitats, and species of the Northwest Straits region.

titles.title: Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2022
Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2022
A bill to reauthorize the Northwest Straits Marine Conservation Initiative Act to promote the protection of the resources of the Northwest Straits, and for other purposes.
